name: Vegebattle: Legum gum
description:
Vegebattle : Legum gum

You are a cool space farmer which travel around the galaxy. One day, your spaceship got some problems, and you need to repair it ! But your living culture start to panic and wants to eat you ! You'll have to repair your spaceship with their juicy vegetable blood :D ! A fun Cartoon FPS, check it out !

(sorry for the cursor, he is not in game :) )

The Game :

Oh no! Your space farm is in danger because the spaceship got damaged! So you have to repair it before it’s get too late! Oh and all the living vegetables start to panic and want to attack you! You don’t have the choice. Destroy these vegetables with your gun and use their blood to fix the rifts so you can save the spaceship from doom!

Vegebattle is a FPS arcade game. You play a space farmer who must save the damaged spaceship. You have to find all the rifts in the spaceship and to fix them. For it, you must shoot the living vegetables to explode them. By exploding them, you release their blood which is very sticky. So you must use that to repair the ship. Kill a vegetable near a rift to fix it with the blood. If the vegetable is too aggressive, use a paralysing spray against it. But watch out to your oxygene which gradually drops. Don’t let the vegetables eat you. 

Controls :

Move with the Z, Q, S and D key / W, A, S and D key

Space : Jump

clic gauche : Shoot

clic droit : Paralysing spray
